text: Sandra "Sandie" Crisp; (January 13, 1960 - January 27, 2021), also known by her stage name The Goddess Bunny, was an American entertainer, drag queen, actress, and model. She was born in Santa Monica, California. She made her acting debut as Charlean in the 1986 movie Hollywood Vice Squad. She made an appearance in the music video for "The Dope Show" by Marilyn Manson. Crisp was a transgender woman. She was born with polio. Crisp ran as a write-in candidate for President of the United States in the 2020 election. Crisp died on January 27, 2021 from problems caused by COVID-19 in Los Angeles, California, at age 61. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:2021 deaths Category:LGBT actors Category:LGBT entertainers Category:LGBT models Category:Drag queens Category:American movie actors Category:Transgender women Category:Actors from Santa Monica, California Category:Models from California Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Los Angeles
title: Goddess Bunny
